website_summaries.verdict: A box of 12 small bottles of eyewash that help soothe eyes and remove debris.
pros: Some people who cannot tolerate eye drops can tolerate this product

customer_reviews.title: Chemical sensitivities? read this!
customer_reviews.text: These little bottles are godsend for people with chemical sensitivities, or anyone who can't tolerate regular eye drops! I've gone years with no way to soothe or rinse my eyes, then started using the large bottle of this product with a glass eye cup...which helped. But these little bottles of purified water with a hint of boric acid, sodium borate and sodium chloride are a miracle for me. When allergies or tired eyes hit, a couple of drops do the trick. Highly recommended!! And thank you, Acme United, for putting out a simple, pure product. They're not easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: 3-5 book a week habit

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: These are an affordable alternative to constant use of artificial tears. I keep one of these next to my bed and use before sleeping and immediately upon waking (I have severe dry eye). Also use sometimes during the day between my doses of lubricating drops. Not what it's designed for, but works really well for me.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this eye wash several times as part of a first aid kit that was stocked with this Eyewash. Unfortunately it is very expensive to get more for just the first aid kit - this is a great price for this much of the eyewash, and it's good to have on hand. We only have two eyes, and if anything gets in them - this is great stuff to have around - is an understatement. Great price too for this much product. Having eye wash cups is also a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: A great way to replenish one or several bags at once. The wash is excellent and packaged for more than one patient making it a great value
customer_reviews.author: NEA Sound

customer_reviews.title: Too hard plastic bottle for squeezing
customer_reviews.text: The bottle's plastic is too hard for squeezing the water out of bottle. Need softer plastic
customer_reviews.author: Maryknoll

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Not much for the price, item I wanted was not available
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our first aid kits at our welding company.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Talley

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for A call center.
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are re-sealable. I bought a large box for our call center and they have come in so handy. I can give one to someone who needs it and they can keep it for some time. Score!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to add to an IFAK, day pack, glove box etc.
customer_reviews.author: Steve 55

customer_reviews.title: great and convenient
customer_reviews.text: These eye wash bottles are great for pesticide applicators on the road. Easy to use and affordable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did get all the bottles of eye wash
customer_reviews.text: Their was only 6 bottles of eye wash in the box
customer_reviews.author: Brian Monnett

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Everyone doing physical work needs protection. Why wait til you get something in your eye to scramble for 911 while trying to fit your head between the sink and faucet? LOL Keep a box of this handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good product - high priced
customer_reviews.text: We use this product for our safety bags and a couple years ago it was twice the size and half the price. Not great value, but a necessary purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Got here fast and is in great shape. Thanks i would use this service again. Especially in a hurry. Product is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Steven Elkins

product_meta.title: First Aid Only 1 oz. Eyewash Bottle, 12 per box (H703)
product_meta.description: TheFirst Aid Only PhysiciansCare 1 oz. Bottle of Eyewash is a sterile ophthalmic solution eyewash, 98.3% purified water. The flushing solution helps to clean the eye and relieve irritation or burning by removing loose foreign material. The bottles come with a tamper evident seal and cap to ensure sterility of the solution. The 1 oz. bottles are an ideal addition to first aid kits, tool boxes, or offices.
feature_bullets: Box contains 12, 1 oz. bottles of sterile ophthalmic solution eyewash, 98.3% purified water
For cleansing the eye to help relieve irritation or burning by removing loose foreign material
Easy flow nozzle helps fluid flush affected area
Tamper evident bottles to ensure sterility of the solution
Ideal for first aid kits, tool boxes, offices or manufacturing facilities
